title: My Main Account
body: So Yesterday I was unable to access my account. Around 225 pm. I used my same login/password and it didnt work. I then used the forgot password and didnt get an email.( I checked all three of my emails) Then I sent  4 Support Tickets form Three different Emails And I hvaent heard back since. RITO PLZ( I think i was hacked but I am not sure) My Main account is Baolong902

replies.body: It can take 24-72 hours for ticket responses depending on the backlog. Please be patient, and do not submit additional tickets or bump them; bumping a ticket pushes it to the back of the queue. Player Support will answer your ticket as soon as they are able.

I took a look into this for you, and see that your ticket has been escalated to an account recovery specialist.  They'll be able to help you out, and will respond as soon as possible!  The duplicate tickets were closed to prevent confusion and focus on your specific issue.  In the meantime, I recommend reviewing our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide in preparation of any questions that might be asked to help recover the account.  Best of luck!
